name: ESCAPE CHIRAQ - Fight Action
description: Fight your way thru more than 95 timing based challenging levels that resemble Chicago's Southside and Downtown neighborhoods. Every background is UNIQUE with none that repeat and captures the "Essence" of Chicago! With 3 playable characters, 5 different round types, Dynamic Bone Breaks, Quicktime events, Special moves, and Hundreds of enemies, there is more than enough action packed content to keep you on the edge of your seat! Timing is key to your survival as you traverse each neighborhood. Do you have what it takes to ESCAPE CHIRAQ?!
